# genesyscloud_users_rules (Data Source)

Data source for Genesys Cloud Users Rules. Select a Users Rule by name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_users_rules" "example_users_rules" {
  name = "Users Rules name"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Users Rule name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
